name: Will Willis and the Temple of Hacha'Kyum
name_original: Will Willis and the Temple of Hacha'Kyum
description:
Help the famous professor and archeologist Will Willis escape the Temple of Hacha'Kyum...

A small (6 levels only) platformer made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 36 #LDJAM (theme was Ancient Technology). I havent had time to make all the 12 levels (3 for each mechanic) I had in mind so, it's short and no ki-sho-ten-ketsu to enjoy, sorry...

Hope you still like it!

Controls:

Controller: A to jump, LB/RB to interact with interruptors, X to skip intro

Keyboard: WASD, Space to Jump, Q/E act as Left Bumper/Right Bumper, Esc to skip intro

Credits:

Everything: RenD (@rend1720)

Font by Daniel Linssen
